comments:
3.2M4

1) Open a file in the Text editor without modifying it.
2) Modify the file externally.
3) Return to Eclipse but do not load the new contents.
4) Modify the contents within the Text editor and then try to Revert.

I'd expected the editor contents to now reflect what was on disk, but I instead get this exception.  The editor is left appearing dirty but when I close it, I am not prompted to save.

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule: P/webtools, does not match outer scope rule: L/webtools/_projectCommon.php
